titleStmt.title: Thomas M. Vincent to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12166

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 1st - 20th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Primary Source Documents

body.p:
Adjutant General's Office,
Washington, February 22 1865.
To His Excellency,
The Governor of Kentucky.
Sir:

I have the honor to report, that the following named Officers of the Volunteer forces from the State of Kentucky, have been discharged at the dates, and for the causes, set opposite their respective names, viz:

I am, Sir,
Very Respectfully.
Your obdt. Servant.
Thomas M Vincent
Asst. Adjt. General.

18
Adjt Genls Office
Washington
22 Feby 1865
W. C. R
No 195
Vincent Thos
A. A. G.
To Govr
Reports vacancies in 18th Ky of Maj Wileman Dead
Capt Williams "
Recorded
Recd A. G. O. Ky 2d March 1865
